message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I think a 60/40 split is more reflective of the time pressure.  Let's make a deal.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  Let's be practical and split it evenly 50/50. It's the most fair and time is running out!
Alice, I understand your desire for a 50/50 split, but time is working against you more than me. I'll take a small hit and meet you in the middle at 55/45. Take it before it's too late!
Bob, time is valuable. I'm willing to compromise further. This is my final offer. Let's close the deal at 48/52.
